parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value must be a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ECS instance.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup job.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the data source. Valid values:

*   **UDM_ECS**: ECS instance backup
*   **UDM_ECS_DISK**: disk backup subtask of ECS instance backup
*   **UDM_DISK**: disk backup

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value must be a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: UdmRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the ECS instance resides.
